title: Why are team rewards gone
body: I'm looking at my profile this morning after the update and I've lost all my team rewards for the ward skin i was finished like wayyyyy over done the points and now its gone :,( {{item:3070}}  please rito

replies.body:
Same here,
i just left 2 ranked teams before i looked at my points and paniced wether this could have been the reason but as far as i understood it leaving a team wont make u loose ur points. 
I really hope this is only a bug and they can reload the data or something!

Greetings,  King Shaka III
